items.title: This cruise stock is outperforming. Goldman Sachs expects momentum to carry into 2026
items.description: The bank upgraded the cruise stock to buy from neutral.

items.title: Investors can lock in yield in these unique assets as Fed likely lowers rates
items.description: These ETFs, which act like bonds, are an easy way for retail investors to lock in yields and ladder to avoid interest-rate volatility.

items.title: NextEra working with Exxon to develop gigawatt data center for hyperscaler
items.description: NextEra plans to pitch the data center site to a hyperscaler. There is no signed agreement with a customer yet.

items.title: NextEra to build 15 gigawatts of power for data centers by 2035
items.description: NextEra CEO John Ketchum acknowledged that the huge power demand from AI data centers is raising affordability concerns.

items.title: Can AI make you the next Warren Buffett? One bank is working to find out
items.description: Deutsche Bank asked its dbLumina AI model to pick a basket of funds.
